alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Back (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 30 at 11:15PM MST until January 02 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches, locally up to 18 inches in the Park City area. Accumulations will be lower in valleys below 6000 feet. * WHERE...Wasatch Back. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions are expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow may mix with or change to rain, especially below 6000 feet Saturday morning through Saturday evening. Areas that change to rain will see lower snow accumulations.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.
